org.transitime.avl

Class PlaybackModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.modules.Module
      • org.transitime.avl.PlaybackModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PlaybackModule
extends Module
    For running the system in "playback mode" where AVL data is read from the database instead of from a realtime AVL feed. Useful for debugging the system software because can easily debug what is happening for a particular vehicle at a particular time.

    This module is different from others because it is not intended to be configured to run as an optional module via CoreConfig.getOptionalModules(). Instead, it is called explicitly. This is necessary since the constructor has different parameters from most modules, which just have a projectId parameter.

    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
